testcase.name: IWO :- Validate All Filter present in iwo page
testcase.system-out: Given User should navigate to Opportunities page............................passed Then User navigates to iwo page.............................................passed Then Select the "Open" from DropDown and validate that same status RR are appearing by clicking on More Details..passed Then Select the "On-Hold" from DropDown and validate that same status RR are appearing by clicking on More Details..passed Then Select the "Archive" from DropDown and validate that same status RR are appearing by clicking on More Details..passed Then Select the "Fulfilled" from DropDown and validate that same status RR are appearing by clicking on More Details..passed Then Search for a particular "1000001123" and validate whether the searched RR is present..passed
